name: Awkward Robot
description:
In Awkward Robot, you need to get Robert the Robot to the exit - but there's a problem - the path is incomplete.

Tilt your Android device to move  the tiles around the screen*; you can also rotate, freeze or destroy some of them.  

When you think you've got the right layout, take control of Robert and guide him to the exit.

* Since windows PCs do not have tilt controls, use WAST or the Arrow Keys to move and Spacebar to jump.
